author: Nintendo of America
description:
Play Skate Story now on Nintendo Switch 2: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/skate-story-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01  

Ollie, kickflip, and grind your way through the ash and smoke of the Underworld as you take on a seemingly impossible quest. Skate fast to destroy demons and save tortured souls on your journey from fragile beginner to hardened skater! 

#NintendoSwitch2 #SkateStory 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: Skate Story – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2

author: Nintendo of America
description:
